20,000 cases of sudless suds laid to rest in Gamble Valley
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A man operating a bulldozer in a wide ditch crushes boxes. Other men stand by a truck filled with more boxes at right.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Alcoholic beverages; Beer; Machinery; Trucks
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: See Oak Ridge journal of December 12, 1946 for an article, but not a photograph, about this event.
3177-5; 12-11-1946; Destruction of 2,000 cases of spoiled Beer
